marketplace
Class BuyerAgent

java.lang.Object
  |

        |
        +--marketplace.BuyerAgent
Direct Known Subclasses:
BestBuyerAgent, BetterBuyerAgent
public class BuyerAgent
extends CIAgent

The BuyerAgent class implements a very simple buyer agent.

See Also:
